data.title: Awesome Place
data.text: The first time I had a chili dog was from Jimmies and that was over the summer in the late 80's when I was a little girl visiting family in Albany.We live in Florida but if we could drive up a few times a week just to eat here I would,its amazing after all these years the food is still great I have no complaints.

data.title: Great local find
data.text: This was a few blocks from my hotel when traveling for business.  A local favorite for sure.  Get the slaw dog, you won't be disappointed!

data.title: Great Food
data.text: The staff are friendly and the food is good and very reasonably priced. The cleanliness could use a lot of improvement.

data.title: Amazing dogs
data.text: I have been to this place quite a few times.  They are fast and cheap. Also the most amazing hot dogs you will ever eat. Usually I get the chili cheese with onions

data.title: Good no frills dog.
data.text: No frills inside and only a couple picnic tables outside.  I had a slaw dog and a chili  dog and both were good.  They use the little red dog which is good for this kind of hotdog.  I liked the chili better than the slaw, not enough mayo in the slaw for my taste.   I would be happy to have two more chili dogs right now.

data.title: On point
data.text: Jimmies Hot Dogs is a must visit for anyone hitting Albany. The place is not at all what I expected, no gourmet about it but the hot dogs are delicious. It's a unique little hole in the wall spot and they don't have many menu options but I found it charming. And did I mention the hot dogs are delicious? Neat experience. It's cash only though so don't get caught there without any dollars in your pocket.

data.title: Best Ever
data.text:
I love Jimmie's. The line moves like the episode on Sienfeld with the Soup Nazi. By that I mean you place your order, it is make quick and off you go. Lol 
Just the best damn hot dogs ever. They are absolutely delicious!!!!!!!! If you are ever in Albany, Ga, even passing by stop and get some!!!!!

data.title: Yum!!!
data.text: Wonderful childhood memories! Lots of onions and a grilled bun make these chili dogs the BEST!!! Where else can you get 6 dogs for 6 bucks?!

data.title: Local favorite since I can remember
data.text: Since I was a small girl I can remember my trips to Jimmies hot dogs to get chili cheese dogs by the bag. This small hole in the wall has a whole bunch of southern hospitality packed with greasy hot dogs exploding with flavor that can not be matched. I am now grown and live in Tallahassee Florida and regularly think about the next chance I will get to go on a nostalgic trip down hot dog memory lane. A trip to jimmies hot dogs can not be passed up when visiting Albany Georgia.

data.title: All the way extra toasted
data.text: This place is a land mark and a childhood favorite. You cant go wrong with these hotdogs. Make sure you get four all the way and a can drink you will be full, but if you need Some for the road make sure you order at least ten. They taste better the next day!

data.title: Tasty, but very small portions
data.text: This place has a lot of history and some very loyal customers. This was our first visit and we expected the most outstanding hot dogs ever. Well, they were very GOOD, but not as good as their reputation. Actually they are chili dogs. The meat is a small wiener (red) with chili sauce and onion. Seems to be steamed because the bun was very warm and soft. Actually it was quite good. I don't think I'd go out of my way to have another one. This is take out only, no tables or chairs inside.

data.title: Taste is the eason you come back!
data.text: It was the first restaurant my grandma tugged me along to on her way through the streets of downtown Albany.We would often stop by before or after visiting the downtown shops and would always by a bag of dogs. They were so tasty i never forgot them no matter where my travels in adult llife took me and though the recipe has changed as they often do the hot dogs are still great and the service as well.

data.title: An Albany must see and eat.
data.text: Jimmies is a famous local hotdog establishment that is right across from the greyhound bus station. It has been a favorite for locals for many years. It's definitely a good bet if you're craving a good hotdog.

data.title: old timey hot dog shop
data.text: Haven't eaten there in a good while, just thought I would recommend trying there hot dogs, I used to live in Albany and my wife and I would go to Jimmy's on Friday nights and get 10 hotdogs for a dollar. We loved the hot dogs there. the last time we were thru Albany we stopped and they were still good as every.

data.title: A local icon
data.text:
This place is older than dirt! It's not too bad though. It's to Albany what White Castle is to a Northern Yankee (which they DON'T have). They are extremely reasonably priced. All they pretty much have on the menu is hot dogs, they specialize in chilli cheese dogs. They ha ave a pungent oder to them but don't let that fool you. Some locals and myself call then "stinky dogs" but they are really good. 

We have taken to this local establishment for almost 10 years now. Aside from making my own, there is no where else I would rather go to for hot dogs in Albany.

data.title: Best fast food dogs in Albany
data.text: You just can't beat Jimmie's Hotdogs for a fast food on the run meal. We often choose Jimmie's to feed the guys at our church on Saturday work days. And it's one of our favorites. Our crew will devour 150 in no time flat. Get 'em with chili, mustard, and onions or skip the onions, your choice. Just get some.

data.title: Albany's Tradition Have to stop and taste
data.text: Jimmies Hot Dogs (stand-to go food) has been around since the dogs cost ten cents. Inflation has caused the regular-all the way dog to cost $1.10 now but it is still a staple in Albany. Some dogs are sent to foreign nations in freeze-dry packs to remind our military of home. I don't know which component makes it flavorful. Is it ketchup, mustard, the finely minced onions, the good quality chili topping or a combination? They offer a slaw dog, chili dog, chili/slaw dog and any other variety; they are all good. You can just about have it any way you would like. Chips and a flavored drink rounds out the visit. So if you are in Albany or to say you have been you have to stop and sample these famous dogs.

data.title: Old favorites
data.text: Delicious although I think the type of hotdog they use now has changed.  Still the same old fashioned hotdog stand.

data.title: Visit to my roots !!!!
data.text:
Jimmie's Hotdogs are Scrumptious ..... The Best!!!! 
My family has enjoyed Jimmie's Hotdogs for many generations . We can't travel anywhere close to Jimmie's and not patronize Jimmie's.
We have always and still do LOVE Jimmie's Hotdogs.

data.title: Tradition
data.text: I like jimmies chilli dogs but not the slaw. Its a none chain food place which makes it great. I would recommend out of towners just try it. There is no inside seating but you will enjoy the experience
